appointment_tips_list.0: You can view and change your booking anytime at <1>Booking Order</1>.
appointment_tips_list.1: For customer who purchased the Test for Nasopharyngeal Cancer or Cancer Screening Package, please note that fasting is not required. You may consume your usual diet and medication.
appointment_tips_list.2: For customer who purchased the Standard Health Check Package, Comprehensive Health Check Package (Male) or Comprehensive Health Check Package (Female), fasting is required for the checking of glucose level. Please keep fasting for at least 8 hours before the appointment, sips of water is allowed. Additional preparations may be required, please pay attention to the notification from clinic.
appointment_tips_list.3: Please bring along your identification document and present this email for identity verification on the date of appointment.
appointment_tips_list.4: Please contact us at {{phone}} to reschedule your appointment if you are unable to attend at the scheduled timeslot.
appointment_tips_list.5: If you have any questions, please get in touch with our Customer Service team at {{phone}}.
appointment_tips_list.10: Trinity Medical Centre will contact you in the next 1-2 working days for the confirmation of appointment. The appointment time confirmed by the staff from Trinity Medical Centre shall prevail.
appointment_tips_list.11: Please keep fasting for at least 8 hours before the blood test since the Take2 ProphecyTM Standard Health Check Package includes the examination of glucose level. Meanwhile, sips of water can be taken.
appointment_tips_list.6: In case the selected clinic or medical centre is not able to provide the service on your preferred date and time, we will contact you by phone to reschedule an appointment.
appointment_tips_list.7: Fasting is not required for the test. You may consume your usual diet and medication.
appointment_tips_list.8: In case the selected clinic or medical centre is not able to provide the service on your preferred date and time, we will contact you by phone to reschedule an appointment.
appointment_tips_list.9: Please contact us at {{phone}} to reschedule your appointment 3 working days in advance if you are unable to attend at the scheduled timeslot.
appointment_tips_list.12: Additional preparations may be required, please pay attention to the notification from clinic.

bottom_intro.1: NPC is also one of the cancers that is more likely to occur in women aged between 40-60<1>1</1>
bottom_intro.2: Some of the early NPC symptoms include headaches, nasal blockage, tinnitus, hoarse voice, blood-stained nasal discharge, neck swelling, and more

first_website_card_intro.1: Utilises Next-generation Sequencing (NGS) technology, that achieves over 97% sensitivity and a 0.7% low false-positive rate, ranking at the top over other similar tests.
first_website_card_intro.2: Covers our top-selling Take2 Prophecy™ Test for Nasopharyngeal Cancer (NPC); and tests for the cancer markers of common cancers in Hong Kong (e.g. colorectal, pancreatic, prostate, and ovarian cancer)

icon.5: The survival rate is greatly dropped to 40%<1>3</1> and the best timing for NPC treatment is often missed when diagnosed at late-stage

intro.1: NPC is one of the common cancers in HK<1>1</1>;
intro.2: it is the top cancer for men aged 20-44<1>2</1>

An early cancer detection test is a medical assessment that helps to identify the risks of cancer in apparently healthy people. A person with cancer may, or may not, be experiencing significant symptoms; moreover, the presence of symptoms alone is not a reliable indicator to confirm having cancer. Under this situation, an early cancer detection test can tell the likeliness of having such disease at the test moment or in the future. Patients might thus make a possible intervention and manage their health.

special.2: Achieving sensitivity >97%<1>4,5</1> with a remarkably low false positive rate (0.7%<1>5</1>)
special.3: Starting from the achievement of the local university’s world-class research team
special.4: Being clinically proven by thousands of individuals<1>4</1>
special.5: Blood-drawing only, non-invasive, and minimal risk
special.6: Having results in 3 working days at the soonest

0.content: You can make appointments on the Take2 Health Online Platform through a one-stop selection of clinics, healthcare professionals, appointment dates, and times.
0.title: <1>1</1>-click online registration

1.content: Simple and non-invasive, Take2 Prophecy™ test only requires a single blood draw at clinic without admission to the hospital; widely accessible with coverage all over the territories. You can take the test nearby your home or work locations.
1.title: Walk <1>2</1> paces for blood drawing

2.content: Results can be available as soon as 3 working days
2.title: Test results ready in <1>3</1> days

NPC.table_intro: Take2 Prophecy™ Test for NPC outperforms other similar tests:
NPC.table_title_intro: Take2 Prophecy™ Test for NPC breaks through the limitations of other similar tests; combining the PCR (Polymerase Chain Reaction) and NGS (Next-generation Sequencing) technologies, the test can accurately detect human and NPC-associated genomic signatures of EBV DNA in the bloodstream by reading the length and sequences of DNA fragments and analysing the variations. As such, NPC patients can be identified at a significantly earlier stage, which allows early interventions and treatments that substantially increase the chance of successful treatment and survival rates.

title.1: Act Now and Stay Vigilant against NPC
title.2:
Take2 Prophecy™ Test for NPC, with significantly high sensitivity and 
extremely low false-positive rate, provides the most accurate and reliable results.
title.4: Key Features of Take2 Prophecy™ Test for NPC
title.5: Following the 3-step procedure, you can take the test at your nearest clinic and complete it within Lunch Time.
title.6: Ground-breaking Technologies Provide You with an Accurate & Reliable Result

productPage.NPC_intro: Take2 Prophecy™ Test for Nasopharyngeal Cancer (NPC) utilises Next-generation Sequencing (NGS) technology, that achieves > 97% sensitivity and a 0.7% low false-positive rate. Providing accurate and reliable results, the Take2 Prophecy™ Test for NPC ranks at the top over other similar tests. It only requires a blood draw to effectively identify early-stage NPC patients.

anchor.5: This comprehensive cancer screening package is designed for all ages.

productPage.attention: Disclaimer: Test items other than the Take2 Prophecy™ Test for NPC are performed by Take2 Health’s partnering laboratories and medical organisations.

back.footer: It means that the occurrence of cancer will become more common, so even young adults should start to be wary of cancer by getting the regular screening in order to detect cancer early.

back_title.1: Cancer accounted for around one-third of HK registered death<1>1</1>
back_title.2: On average, 96 people were diagnosed with cancer everyday<1>2</1>
back_title.3: The annual number of new cancer cases is projected to increase by around 35% to more than 42 000 by 2030<1>3</1>
back_title.4: Many cancer patients may not experience any obvious symptoms in the early-stage
back_title.5: In many cases, the early-stage symptoms are non-specific and are considered as non-cancer-related illnesses
back_title.6: For instance, some early NPC symptoms resemble flu or allergic rhinitis. Patients may suffer from headaches, tinnitus, nasal blockage, and so on
back_title.7: When the worsening symptoms are noticed, cancer may have spread to other parts of the body already. The golden period for treatment might have passed
back_title.8: Tobacco use, alcohol consumption, high body mass index, irregular meals, low fruit and vegetable intake, and lack of physical activity are all high-risk factors for cancer
back_title.9: Around one-third of deaths from cancer are due to the abovementioned modern lifestyle<1>4</1>

icon_intro.2: cancer is the top killer in Hong Kong,
icon_intro.3: which its number of new cases is increasing each year
icon_intro.4: Is rectal bleeding due to hemorrhoids?
icon_intro.5: It might be too late, when symptoms persist and we finally decide to do a health check
icon_intro.6: Is nose bleeding due to dry weather?

productPage.intro: Covers our top-selling Take2 Prophecy™ Test for Nasopharyngeal Cancer (NPC); and tests for the cancer markers of common cancers in Hong Kong (e.g. colorectal, pancreatic, liver, prostate, breast and ovarian cancer); which complement with our professional medical team’s caring support, this non-invasive Cancer Screening Package is now available for booking online with flexible service options.
productPage.intro2: It covers the detection of multiple cancer markers for the common cancers in Hong Kong, including colorectal, pancreatic, liver, prostate, breast, and ovarian cancer, the Cancer Screening Package aims to help you identify cancer early when treatment is likely to work best.

advance.1: The most reliable NPC screening test available on the market

intro.1: Sensitivity >97%<1>5,6</1>, with a remarkably low false-positive rate(0.7%<1>6</1>)
intro.2: Utilising Next-generation Sequencing technology, specialises in capturing the NPC-associated EBV DNA present in the bloodstream
intro.3: Developed by the leading Hong Kong university research team and validated by a large-scale clinical study<1>5</1>

title.1: Why Must You Screen for Cancers?

intro.1: Serious health problems might not present with noticeable symptoms in their early stages.
intro.2: Regular health checks help us monitor the changes in our physical conditions and identify potential diseases well before complications develop; in particular, chronic diseases such as hypertension and diabetes have shown a trend of occurring at a younger age than before.

intro.1: Taking cancer treatment as an example, the frequency of chemotherapy or radiotherapy and treatment options may vary for patients diagnosed at different stages.
intro.2: Based on a patient with monthly income of HK $50,000, taking into account the treatment expenses and income loss of the patient,
intro.3: having cancer diagnosed at its early stage could result in a possible saving of over HK $300,000.*
intro.4: * Source: “Early screening for nasopharyngeal cancer could reduce the family by up to six-digits total expenses and losses”, Sunday Kiss, 6 December 2021 (Translated)

mobile.intro1: Based on a patient with monthly income of HK $50,000,
mobile.intro2: having cancer diagnosed at its early stage could result in a possible saving of over HK $300,000.*

card.3: In addition to our medical history, we can gain further health insights from the results of regular health checks and consultations with healthcare professionals.
card.4: Thus, we can modify our eating, exercising, and sleep habits which lowers the risks of developing potentially lethal diseases, such as heart attack and stroke.
card.title1: Identify disease at its early stage
card.title3: Reduce risks of potentially lethal diseases, e.g., heart attack and stroke

health_check.featrue: Developed by the Hong Kong university’s leading research team and validated by a large-scale clinical study<1>1</1>
health_check.intro: The packages include: the Take2 Prophecy™ Test for NPC, other cancer screenings, CBC, liver function, renal function, diabetes screening, blood lipids, thyroid assessment, cardiovascular function assessment, and chest and lung assessment. The report will be interpreted by a registered physician.
health_check.mark: Important Note: Patients who have had organ transplant, currently have cancer or autoimmune diseases, or those currently receiving systemic glucocorticoid or immunosuppressive treatment are not recommended for early NPC detection using our test. If in doubt, please consult healthcare professionals for more information.
health_check.mark_mobile: Disclaimer: Test items other than the Take2 Prophecy™ Test for NPC are performed by Trinity Medical Centre and their partnering laboratory.
health_check.table_intro: The health check packages cover more than 30 investigation items, including the Take2 Prophecy™ Test for NPC, other cancer screenings, CBC, liver function, renal function, diabetes screening, blood lipids, thyroid assessment, cardiovascular function assessment, and chest and lung assessment. The report will be interpreted by a registered physician, promising you professional and reliable care.
health_check.table_preIntro: Age takes a toll on our physical conditions and health. However, living in a fast-paced city, we often neglect our needs to care for our bodies. Besides, coupled with an unhealthy diet, lack of physical activities, stressful environment, and other factors, even younger ones are at increased risk of developing chronic diseases and cancers. Therefore, regular health check is important, no matter how old you are.

title.1: Taking Action Early to Ward Off Disasters Later, Prevention is Better than Cure.

circle.1: Developed by the Hong Kong university’s leading research team and validated by a large-scale clinical study<1>1</>
circle.3: Sensitivity >97%<1>1,2</1>, with a remarkably low false-positive rate (0.7%<1>1</1>)
